summary: The implementation delivers a landing page for a native mobile app concept (Focus) that acknowledges platform limitations. However, the features section describes capabilities (content filtering, app time limits, system-level protection) that contradict the BuildRequest's explicit constraints and non-goals. The BuildRequest states these features require native mobile OS capabilities and cannot be implemented in web applications, yet the landing page markets them as if they will be delivered.

hallucinated_features.description: Content filtering feature marketed as blocking inappropriate and adult content across all apps and browsers
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints explicitly state 'Web applications cannot implement device-level content filtering' and non-goals include 'Block adult content at the device or network level'. The Features.tsx component describes this capability as if it will be delivered.

hallucinated_features.description: App time limits feature that locks apps for 12 hours when limits are reached
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints state 'Web applications cannot enforce app usage time limits at the system level' and non-goals include 'Restrict access to other mobile applications'. Features.tsx markets this as a deliverable feature.

hallucinated_features.description: Tamper-proof system and secure protection claims
hallucinated_features.reason: The Features.tsx 'Secure Protection' card claims settings cannot be bypassed, but BuildRequest acknowledges these require native OS capabilities with system-level permissions that are not being implemented.

hallucinated_features.description: Native mobile app with deep system integration
hallucinated_features.reason: Features.tsx and HowItWorks.tsx describe downloading from App Store/Google Play and having deep system integration. BuildRequest non-goals explicitly state 'Create native mobile app functionality'.

hallucinated_features.description: Family profiles with age-appropriate content filters
hallucinated_features.reason: Features.tsx describes family profiles with content filtering capabilities, but BuildRequest constraints indicate content filtering cannot be implemented in web applications.
